channel.title: Trump CZ Pardon Prediction
channel.description: Will Trump pardon Binance founder CZ before 2026 midterms?

item.title: Will Trump pardon Binance founder CZ before 2026 midterms?
item.description: Reports suggest Trump may pardon Changpeng Zhao (CZ), former Binance CEO, who faced charges in Biden administration's crypto crackdown. Market resolves YES if presidential pardon issued before November 2026 midterm elections.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if President Trump issues a presidential pardon to Changpeng Zhao (CZ) before November 3, 2026 (midterm election day). Resolution requires official White House announcement or Department of Justice records confirming the pardon.
